alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:31AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meriwether, southern Troup, west central Talbot and Harris Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 831 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett, or over Lanett, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, West Point, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Cataula, Mountain Hill, Durand, Jones Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Harris City, Fortson, Pine Mountain Valley, Mulberry Grove, and Whitesville-Pine Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
